A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is a train wreck that insults the intelligence of its audience. Visually stunning\, superficially clever\, but profoundly tone deaf and philosophically hollow. Its \"themes\"\, which astonishingly seem to impress some people\, are so on the nose\, and at the same time inconsistent\, that it makes for a frustrating viewing experience\, like reading a poorly argued high school paper. Not recommended.
